interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MUSE & Co Gel Strip 30 (MC-015)
Review Date: 2020/10/03
Store: MUSENCO
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Size': 'Large', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'MC-015', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 0.39 x 4.33 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'}
Review Text: Loving these nail stickers! They are surprisingly durable and have strong adhesion to the nail that stays put. The package comes with 2 alcohol wipes and a nail file to help prep the nail prior to application. I did my ring finger as an accent nail, then painted the rest of my nails. I love how the final look came out! When I went to apply, I started at the bottom of my nail then carefully pressed the sticker down. I filed off the rest of the sticker to get it a clean finish. The nail stickers are really big and I have short nails so I was actually able to do BOTH of my ring fingers with just 1 sticker -- awesome!! I had enough left after I filed the first one off that I flipped it and put it on my other ring finger. I'm pretty active and hard on my hands and these have surprised me with how well they stay on. They have stayed on through a full weekend of house chores -- multiple hand dish-washings, laundry, cleaning, etc and have gone strong through the week.
Review Title: Durable, Strong Adhesive. Looks Great.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'} This kit is the most basic starter kit for the Red Carpet gel nails. It has everything you need to get started, except for colors. Be sure to purchase a color or colors as well so you have everything you need. The lamp works great and all products arrived in mint condition and worked as described. Color usually stays on for 2 weeks, if you don't pick at your nails.

I previously purchased a larger kit that I liked more than this kit (here): Red Carpet Manicure Pro 45 LED Gel Nail Polish Kit Soak Off Starter Package https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00662Z24A/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_tai_MsVmFbXQFB0CA

The reason I liked it more is because that kit came with more products and the lamp feels sturdier: 1 color, nail files and “erase” tube (what you use to remove the gel nail polish).

However, if you’re on a budget - this kit is probably the way to go. AND you can pick which color or colors you’d like (separately).

Even though at first glance this lamp seemed less nice, it works just as well. My nails were fully cured within 45 seconds. After using it a few times and getting the hang of it, I’m usually able to do all my nails within 20-30 minutes. Easy to do while watching TV or listening to the radio. :) Cost-Effective Starter Kit for At-Home Gel Nails Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'} I saw some reviews commenting that the nozzle moves even when the cap is screwed on. This is true, but I personally don’t think that’s a reason not to get this set. I do think it’s worth noting that you’re getting a REALLY nice quality glass bottle in a 2-pack for under $15. Personally, the nozzle moving didn’t bother me at all and I am really pleased with the quality. Love the amber glass, because as the description mentions - this makes it safe to mix up your own concoctions with essential oils and it doesn’t ruin the oils. I make my own cleaning solutions and these have worked like a charm. Solid Value for the Price Lash Lift Kit -Buqikma Eyelash Perm Kit Lash Curling Set Semi-Permanent Lifting Perming Wave for Salon and Personal Use (Glue Upgraded Version) Buqikma {'Brand': 'Buqikma', 'Included Components': 'Eyelash Perm Kit', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.7 x 0.9 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Buqikma'} This product is not without its flaws, but if you are patient enough it will work. My biggest issue was with the glue. I had the hardest time trying to get my lashes to actually stick to the pad. It took a long time, and even then I had some that just refused to stay. All in all it probably took me an hour to do one eye (I’d strongly recommend doing each eye individually if you’re doing them yourself). The other recommendation I’d give is to watch some YouTube tutorials before starting. The instructions are bad, but they aren’t great and there are a lot of videos out there to help ensure you’re doing things correctly. Overall, my lashes were lifted and I’m fairly happy with the result. It wasn’t as dramatic as I hoped (you can see that with mascara my lifted lashes look the same as my curled lashes) but I do think it looks nice. If you’re looking for a cheap diy alternative to the salon I’d say try it out. But if you have the time and money, I’d opt for a professional service instead. Not Perfect, But It Works Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} I have a bit of a love/hate relationship with this scrub. What I LOVE about it is the delicious, robust coffee scent. It is STRONG and packs a powerful punch in the morning, which helps to wake me up. I also love the serious grit it has to it. The texture varies from fine grounds to courser grounds, with a higher ratio of course grounds. Each scrub feels like it's getting deep into my skin. I feel like I'm scrubbing off layers of dead skin, dirt, grime, etc. when I'm using this. My skin feels smoother and softer after I use this scrub. I apply lotion straight out of the shower and my body is soft as a cloud!

What I sort of hate about this product is how messy it is. It just falls apart and gets everywhere. I included photos of what a hot mess my sink and shower look like after using it. Other scrubs I've used in the past have some agent that keeps them together to prevent it from going everywhere, but this doesn't. One I tried recently that I loved was JOON X MOON (https://www.amazon.com/Watermelon-Exfoliating-Moisturizing-Nourish-Essential/dp/B0876GX6MQ/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=moon+cube+body+scrub&qid=1600826357&sr=8-2), and that is in cube form to start, then breaks down to scrub as you rub it and use water. It does an incredible job of exfoliating without making a mess of my small shower. If you're not into the cube thing, I also like stuff that B&BW makes and they sell it on Amazon. It's has a paste-like consistency and does a good job at making your skin feel soft like a baby! Here is a Bath & Body Works aromatherapy scrub - I loooove this one: https://www.amazon.com/Bath-Body-Works-AROMATHERAPY-Eucalyptus/dp/B005LZUP36/ref=sr_1_14?dchild=1&keywords=sugar+scrub&qid=1600826921&sr=8-14

The other thing I wasn't a huge fan of was the packaging. I have a tiny shower, so it is impossible to take anything in there without getting wet. Every time I take this into the shower, I'm nervous the bag will get soaked and ruin it. There is a waxy coat applied to the bag, which helps protect it, but it still doesn't give me as much confidence as something like a glass jar or tin would. Ideally, the scrub wouldn't get soaked until I'm ready to use it. It has held up through 3 uses so far but I may transfer it into a mason jar and store it that way.

The other thing that really bummed me out was that is stained my clothes!!! I towel dried after shower, put on moisturizer, then light gray leggings. There must have been a tiny amount of residule coffee scrub because it stained my leggings!!

Overall, a decent scrub to try. Not my favorite scrub, since it stained my clothes and made my shower a mess. Love and Hate this Scrub MUSE & Co Gel Strip 30 (MC-015) MUSENCO {'Size': 'Large', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'MC-015', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 0.39 x 4.33 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Loving these nail stickers! They are surprisingly durable and have strong adhesion to the nail that stays put. The package comes with 2 alcohol wipes and a nail file to help prep the nail prior to application. I did my ring finger as an accent nail, then painted the rest of my nails. I love how the final look came out! When I went to apply, I started at the bottom of my nail then carefully pressed the sticker down. I filed off the rest of the sticker to get it a clean finish. The nail stickers are really big and I have short nails so I was actually able to do BOTH of my ring fingers with just 1 sticker -- awesome!! I had enough left after I filed the first one off that I flipped it and put it on my other ring finger. I'm pretty active and hard on my hands and these have surprised me with how well they stay on. They have stayed on through a full weekend of house chores -- multiple hand dish-washings, laundry, cleaning, etc and have gone strong through the week. Durable, Strong Adhesive. Looks Great.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Care and Beauty Enthusiast**: Enthusiastic about at-home nail care, particularly gel nails and starter kits, with a recent positive experience using durable nail stickers, indicating a growing interest in nail art and creative designs.

- **Budget-Conscious**: Prioritizes cost-effective solutions while ensuring quality, often selecting value-oriented products that meet her needs without sacrificing performance.

- **Versatility and Customization**: Enjoys products that allow for personal expression, evidenced by experimenting with accent nails and combining stickers with traditional polish for a customized look.

- **Functionality and Efficiency**: Values practical products that yield quick results and ease of use; recent interactions showcase a preference for items with strong adhesion and durability, especially in demanding situations.

- **Critical Yet Constructive Evaluator**: Continues to provide detailed feedback on her purchases, recognizing both strengths and weaknesses in product performance, which informs her decisions in her beauty routine.

- **Positive User Experience**: Maintains optimism towards products that meet expectations; her latest review reflects satisfaction with performance and functionality, aligning with her practical approach.

- **Commitment to Continuous Learning**: Actively seeks tutorials and tips to enhance her DIY experiences, showcasing a proactive approach to beauty and self-care.

- **Interest in Eco-Friendly Solutions**: Invests in sustainable and functional products, looking for environmentally conscious options but remains aware of packaging waste and durability issues.

Overall, this user's profile highlights a blend of creativity, practicality, and an evolving beauty regimen, with an emphasis on effective, personalized experiences.
